(@p45, @p46, @p47, @p48, @p49, 9)) AS i ([ApplicationId], [Approvals], [DestinationId], [Direction], [OriginId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([ApplicationId], [Approvals], [DestinationId], [Direction], [OriginId])
VALUES (i.[ApplicationId], i.[Approvals], i.[DestinationId], i.[Direction], i.[OriginId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position;"

FROM [sys].[default_constraints] [d]
INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] [c] ON [d].[parent_column_id] = [c].[column_id] AND [d].[parent_object_id] = [c].[object_id]

INNER JOIN [dbo].[Application] AS [a] ON [n].[ApplicationId] = [a].[Id]
INNER JOIN [dbo].[Unit] AS [u] ON [n].[OriginId] = [u].[Id]
INNER JOIN [dbo].[Unit] AS [u0] ON [n].[DestinationId] = [u0].[Id]
WHERE [n].[ApplicationId] = @__applicationId_0"
